item.title: Report E-2025030259
item.description:
Report E-2025030259

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-26T21:14:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-20
  • City: ELKTON
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ESTES EXPRESS LINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 8000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Hepaco personnel were dispatched to the site. Upon the contractorâ€™s arrival, they observed an estimated two (2) gallons of material released from one (1) box containing two (2) 1-gallon plastic jugs punctured by a forklift. Hepaco personnel observed that the released material impacted 2 ft-by-2 ft area of dock floor concrete. Hepaco personnel deployed granular absorbents to neutralize the area and absorb the material containerizing them into one (1) 55-gallon poly drums. The incident generated a total of one (1) container. One (1) 55- gallon poly drum containing empty bottles / neutralized impacted absorbents / Cardboard. All impacted surfaces were confirmed to be neutral, and work was approved. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal prior to the contractor demobilization. The generated waste will remain onsite for the ESTES DGRM team to coordinate disposal.

item.title: Report X-2025030906
item.description:
Report X-2025030906

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-22T21:13:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-13
  • City: LAUREL
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TOO WHITE BELT AFTER LAST CART FOR LEAKING HAZMAT. RESPONDER, WITH FULL PPE, DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEET, CAME AND OBSERVED A FLAMMABLE LIQUID LABEL AND DETERMINED LEAKAGE WAS CONFINED TO OUTER CARTON. PLACED PACKAGE IN SPILL TUB AND RETURNED TO DMP FOR PROCESSING.
